EmailTemplate.name: 201809_WebinarInvite_RDRBoeing_LG.201809_WebinarInvite_RDRBoeing_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Reduce No-Fault-Founds on Your IntuVue Weather Radar System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> TECH TIPS WEBINAR:
Reduce No-Fault-Found Part Removals on your IntuVue Weather Radar System Please join us... Two Options: 18 September: 11am-12pm EDT <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GUwxEFUHQpKfIPerPyjPZg> (UTC -4) <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GUwxEFUHQpKfIPerPyjPZg>
19 September: 9pm-10pm EDT <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Yk7YVkTrR0iH_-OjQCCRJA> (UTC -4) <https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Yk7YVkTrR0iH_-OjQCCRJA>
Location Please click the appropriate link above to register.
Our goal is to keep you flying with fewer system removals and less strain on your spares inventory. Honeywell’s IntuVueTM RDR-4000 Weather Radar System provides system maintenance information to help you review fault codes and identify corrective actions.
Join Honeywell experts Bob Miller and Rosemary Susai to review commonly-seen system fault codes to ensure the correct system component is removed on the first attempt and reduce your no-fault found on Boeing platforms.
Register by selecting one of the two available sessions. After you register, you have the option to save this meeting to your calendar.
Questions will be answered.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
